jobsJson.descriptionPlain: As a Business Intelligence Analyst, you will be placed in GoMerchant, and will work closely with Data Scientist as well as Business Analyst team to find insight from large amount of data. In daily basis, you will process data to produce ad-hoc analysis and its visualisation with various business context. You will need to enjoy solving challenging problems and provide analytics to support your proposed solutions. Accuracy, up-to-date and useable informations are very important aspects in producing your analysis. If you have those criteria and would like to get exposure on how financial technology company make use of its data, we would like to hear from you and look forward for you to join the team!
jobsJson.description: As a Business Intelligence Analyst, you will be placed in GoMerchant, and will work closely with Data Scientist as well as Business Analyst team to find insight from large amount of data. In daily basis, you will process data to produce ad-hoc analysis and its visualisation with various business context. You will need to enjoy solving challenging problems and provide analytics to support your proposed solutions. Accuracy, up-to-date and useable informations are very important aspects in producing your analysis. If you have those criteria and would like to get exposure on how financial technology company make use of its data, we would like to hear from you and look forward for you to join the team!
jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Identify and translate opportunities into actionable recommendations to achieve Merchants Group and company OKRs
  • Perform analytic deep dives to drive business insights and influence strategic decisions
  • Establish relevant reporting for the group, perform necessary ad-hoc analyses as required to support strategy and analyse performance of feature changes / experimentation
  • Build and maintain data foundation relevant for business users
  • Proactively identify actions to capture value i.e.: merchant and customer segmentation, retention method, product success metrics

• Minimum 3-5 years of experience in Business Intelligence and / or Analytics, with experience of taking on roles with increasing responsibility
  • Excellent problem-solving skills and good sense of numbers
  • High level of attention to details
  • Excellent communication and presentation skills
  • Knowledge of BI best practices/methodologies (including basic statistics, experimental design, and machine learning)
  • Proficient in using SQL or any other programming tools
  • Have a strong business acumen to support the analyses
  • Experience with data visualisation and reporting tools (Tableau, Metabase)
